events.message: I recently received my order and the product arrived with multiple scratches and some parts are broken. This is really disappointing.
The reported issue has been reviewed and categorized under Product Defect due to the customer mentioning broken parts and scratches.
The case has been assigned to the technical support team to handle the defective product report.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the condition of your product. I’m here to assist you with this issue.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches and broken parts? This will help us process your case more quickly.
I have attached several photos showing the damages on the product. Please let me know what the next steps are.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement free of charge or a full refund, whichever you prefer.
I would like to go ahead with the replacement. Thank you for handling this swiftly.
Your replacement product has been shipped and should arrive within 5 business days. We appreciate your patience.
Just checking in to make sure your replacement product arrived in perfect condition and you are satisfied with the resolution.
Yes, the replacement arrived yesterday and is in excellent condition. Thank you very much for your help.
Great to hear you’re happy with the replacement. We are closing this case now. Please reach out if you need further assistance.
A short survey has been sent to your email to gather feedback on your recent support experience.
